name: Mobile Reality
tagline: create profitable digital products / monetize data
description:
Designing and creating profitable digital products like mobile and WEB applications. Transforming data into the client's profit. End-to-end custom software development. Business Intelligence specialists as an official partner of Tableau Software.  Data science experts, forecasting models and machine learning solutions in R language.
Lovers of such technologies as React.JS / React Native, Node.JS, AWS, Android, iOS, Tableau Software, R.
Why Mobile Reality?
Create a strong partnership with people who will not only manage the tech side of your project but as well will give you a piece of advice on the business part. 
We love building online things which are useful. We believe in creative ideas that use current technologies to make an impact.
